entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is asking questions to the ghost, Myrtle.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: A ghost who died in the same cubicle where Harry is talking to her. She is described as being teased by Olive Hornby about her glasses.

relationships.description: Harry is interacting with Myrtle, asking her questions about how she died.
Olive Hornby was teasing Myrtle about her glasses.
